name: McQuisten_2007_1
desc: An ASO-activity dataset collected by IDT from a now defunct ASO database (https://doi.org/10.1093/bioinformatics/16.9.843) and also from patent data. According to the publication each ASO have a full phosphothioate backbone and no chimeric sequences.
label_desc: Activity range from 0 (complete target inhibition) to  1 (no difference in target activity when compared to appropriate control). The activity were all measured from either protein product or direct mRNA level.
